eu.ensg.jade.output

Class OBJWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.ensg.jade.output.OBJWriter

  • public class OBJWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    OBJCreator is the class implementing the creation of obj files.

        Parameters:
        filePath - the path to the obj file
        objectList - the list of buildings
        xCentroid - the centroid x coordinate
        yCentroid - the centroid y coordinate
